dcterms:creator: Y. Bengio
P. Frasconi
P. Simard
dcterms:description: A benchmark for evaluating the ability of models to learn long-term dependencies, where the distinctive information for classification is only located in the first positions of the input sequences.
dcterms:title: XOR

dcterms:creator: Y. Bengio
P. Frasconi
P. Simard
dcterms:description: A problem involving a dynamical system that generates a Boolean sequence based on previous states, used to test the learning capabilities of recurrent networks.
dcterms:title: Charging Problem

dcterms:creator: Y. Bengio
P. Frasconi
P. Simard
dcterms:description: A benchmark for evaluating models on their ability to learn long-term dependencies, particularly when the relevant information is located at the beginning of long sequences.
dcterms:title: Long-Term Dependencies Benchmark
